item.title: Fillup Status App 1.1
item.author: joeliu3rd@icloud.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: This is the third post to ‘Fillup’, to see the first post about it, go here, the second here To download the APK, scroll to the bottom, or press here, iOS coming soon I now added two EditText boxes to mark in your player’s coordinates, bolded the title and slightly condense them features together. The HP bar (the number changes as you use the slider) Download Enjoy!

item.title: Fillup Status App
item.author: joeliu3rd@icloud.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: UPDATE 30/01/2024: Download now at fillup-status-app-1.1 This is the second post to ‘Fillup’, to see the first post about it, go here To download the APK, go here, iOS coming soon I made this app to organise my game better, by allowing players to roll their moves dice and slide their Health Point themselves. So far, only on Android 5.0+, but this proves I am capable of making mobile apps, and web applications.
